title: RARE e107 Breisch-Williams/Oxford Confectionery Postcard - now $105 as of 8/16!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: RARE e107 Breisch-Williams/Oxford Confectionery Postcard - now $105 as of 8/16!!
posts.post_content:
Really neat postcard showing the Oxford Confectionary Caramel Factory in Oxford, Pennsylvania. In 1921, the year this postcard was used, the Oxford Confectionery company (formerly Breisch-Williams) used baseball cards - the E253 Oxford Confectionary set - as promotional items that they included with its candy.  

Asking $105 delivered.  This is a must-have for anyone who has an interest in the e107/e103/e253 sets and would like a companion piece to go along with the cards.

Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Wish I had that kind of parking around my house....heh!
One more bump down to $120 delivered...
Lowering the price on this postcard....down to $105 now.  Thanks!
